title: AG Orchestral Background Music Collection
longDescription:
Taking advantage of the wide and varied orchestral sound, you will find here 12 very different tracks for different fantasy scenarios and situations. All these tracks are meant to sound in the background, but were composed to still keep a strong personality and to be recognizable.

Each track lasts between 1 to 2 minutes and some of them may be more specific, while others might be more suggestive and/or versatile. But in any case, the final choice is yours!


  1. The Temple in the Water
  2. Hope for Tomorrow
  3. Deep Within the Abyss
  4. Far Away, but Safe
  5. The Dark Chasm
  6. Gazing at the Battleground
  7. Palace Affairs
  8. The Forest Lost Amidst Time
  9. The Clown Has Arrived
  10. That Great City by the Sea
  11. That Lustrous Town by the Dunes
  12. The Warmth of the Cold North


Demos:

https://youtu.be/srHa9_clgS8?si=2J9QZpB3UkxqMN8p

technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  12 tracks
  •  11 loopable (intro file + loop file)
  •  1 randomizable (10 short melodies)

Number of Audio Wavs: 31

Number of Audio Cues: 31

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,1 kHz 16 bits

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 23

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
